title: The Billionaire's Christmas Bride (Big Bad Billionaires, #3)
description: Snowed In With The Grinch—And The Christmas Dare That Changed EverythingA grumpy billionaire doctor.A Christmas-loving pastry chef who’s his complete opposite.A marriage of convenience that neither of us saw coming.I came to this small-town cabin to escape the holiday chaos.Weston Kincaid—billionaire surgeon, emotionally unavailable, and entirely too good-looking—came to recover from an accident.But thanks to a double-booking disaster, we’re snowed in together over Christmas.No power. No distractions. Just us.I bake my way through the season.He thinks desserts are a waste of time.I hum Christmas carols.He glares at me like I just suggested surgery without anesthesia.I should not be noticing how good he looks in those tailored scrubs…But then he dares me to prove that Christmas magic is real.Challenge accepted.But as the snow falls and the tension between us intensifies, I realize the real challenge isn’t making him believe in Christmas…It’s making him believe in love.And when he springs an unexpected proposal, I have to wonder…Could this fake marriage turn into something real?
author: L. Steele
